title: Senior Software Engineer
body: A transparent and easy to use logistics platform that helps Carriers and Forwarders collaborate to build trusted grow-driven business relationship.

title: Managing Partner
body: Assemble a remote dedicated team to design and develop quick IoT & Software solutions for startups and SMEs, by helping them validate the market quick and incrementally

title: Tech Lead
body: A data capture, interpretation, and solution implementation through gamification. Its goal is to engage people around skill-enhancing games and lead them to better perform at their jobs while having fun.
